name: ejs
notes: EJS works in Workers but has a CommonJS JSON import issue at lib/ejs.js:54 (`require('../package.json').version`). This causes failures in vitest tests but works fine when deployed or tested with `wrangler dev`. The bundler (esbuild) handles the JSON import correctly at build time, making the package functional in production. Note: EJS file system features won't work - use string templates only.
